item.title: hugo
item.description: 1. hugo安装配置 1.1 下载hugo 下载 hugo ,并配置环境变量 运行demo cd e:workspace/workspace-notes/ hugo new site notes cd notes git submodule add https://github.com/razonyang/hugo-theme-bootstrap themes/hugo-theme-bootstrap mkdir config cp -a themes/hugo-theme-bootstrap/exampleSite/config/* ./config #复制exampleSite\con
